mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (password, writer, title, content, ref) VALUES (#{password}, #{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, ( SELECT IFNULL(ref, 0) + 1 FROM (SELECT MAX(ref) AS ref FROM review) tmp ) )
mapper.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY r.review_no) AS rn, r.* FROM review r
ORDER BY r.ref DESC, r.ref_order LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{cpp}
SELECT * FROM review ORDER BY review_no DESC LIMIT 0, 5
mapper.update: UPDATE review SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, update_date = current_timestamp WHERE review_no = #{reviewNo}
mapper.select: SELECT ref_order, answer_cnt FROM review WHERE ref_order = ( SELECT MAX(ref_order) FROM review WHERE parent_no = #{parentNo} )
mapper.insert: INSERT review (password, writer, title, content, ref, step, ref_order, parent_no) VALUES (#{password}, #{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, #{ref}, #{step}, #{refOrder}, #{parentNo})
